channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: The Cities of the Plain
channel.description:
![ESOk5HQXcAETbaz|690x388](upload://kKkqYaWq5IW6jdPlyn96yO2AYnF.jpeg)
*“And it came to pass, when God destroyed the cities of the plain, that God remembered Abraham, and sent Lot out of the midst of the overthrow, when he overthrew the cities in which Lot dwelt.”* Genesis 19:29
Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in April. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play. We will be using the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg).
[date=2020-04-11 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-04-11 time=22:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] [date=2020-04-18 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-04-18 time=22:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] [date=2020-04-25 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-04-25 time=22:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.

We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.

This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.

There will be 3 sessions in April. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
